pages.text: You can make $(l:oritech:resources/steel)steel$(), $(l:oritech:resources/electrum)electrum$(), and $(l:oritech:resources/adamant)adamant$() in a crafting table, but it wastes resources to do it that way.$(br2)As soon as you can, you will want to build a $(l:oritech:processing/pulverizer)pulverizer$() and $(l:oritech:processing/foundry)foundry$() so that you can make alloys more efficiently.
